name: TRANS_CC_EMP_ONL_ID
description: This table holds the list of User records without linked provider records that are CC'ed recipients on transcription messages for the associated note. The value is entered from CC recipient field.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TRANS_CC_EMP_ONL_ID
columns.description: This column holds the list of user records without linked provider records that are CC'ed recipients on transcription messages for the associated note. The value is entered from CC recipient field.

columns.name: TRANS_CC_EMP_ONL_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
